casebody.data:
Shawn P. DOYLE and Thyme B. Doyle, Individually, and on Behalf of Their Minor Children, Brady Doyle, Shawn Michael Doyle and Maggie Grace Doyle
v.
LONESOME DEVELOPMENT, LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY, Nautilus Insurance Company, Natchez Trace Property Owners Association Inc., Western World Insurance Company and Renaissance Property Management, a Division of Renaissance Realty Services, LLC NO. 2018-C-1369 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 14, 2018

Denied.

JOHNSON, C.J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Holdridge.

CRICHTON, J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Holdridge.

GENOVESE, J., would grant for the reasons assigned by Judge Holdridge.
